official_title: Does Exposure to Electronic Nicotine Delivery Systems Advertising Affect Positive Smoking Expectancies and Social Normative Beliefs About Smoking?
inclusion_criteria:
-
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 14 Years
Must have maximum age of 17 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Exclusion criteria will include inadequate English proficiency, and diagnosis of a learning or vision disorder.
